procedureTemplates.name: Software Engineer Hiring Process
procedureTemplates.description: Standard hiring workflow for software engineering positions

template.title: interview requested by {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Candidate has requested an interview for {{company.department}} position

template.title: interview requested by {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Candidate has requested an interview for {{company.department}} position

template.title: Role discussion with {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Candidate wants to discuss role details

template.title: Interview scheduled with {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Interview scheduled for {{event.data.proposedTime}}

template.title: Interview completed with {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Interview lasted {{event.data.duration}} minutes

template.title: Positive feedback for {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Interview feedback: {{event.data.notes}}

template.title: Contract sent via DocuSign
template.content: Employment contract has been sent via DocuSign (Envelope ID: {{captures.envelopeId}})

template.title: Contract signed
template.content: Contract has been signed by the candidate

template.title: Check lifecycle policy
template.content: Check policy on onboarding

stateMachine.fsl: idle 'contact_candidate' -> contacting_candidate; contacting_candidate 'discuss_role' -> role_discussed; role_discussed 'schedule_interview' -> interview_scheduled; interview_scheduled 'conduct_interview' -> interview_conducted; interview_conducted 'positive_feedback' -> contract_prepared; interview_conducted 'negative_feedback' -> failure; contract_prepared 'send_contract' -> contract_sent; contract_sent 'wait_for_signature' -> contract_signed; contract_sent 'rejection' -> failure; contract_signed 'check_lifecycle' -> onboarding_started; onboarding_started 'complete_training' -> training_completed; training_completed 'probation_period' -> probation_review; probation_review 'positive_feedback' -> salary_review; probation_review 'negative_feedback' -> termination_initiated; salary_review 'positive_feedback' -> performance_review; salary_review 'negative_feedback' -> termination_initiated; performance_review 'positive_feedback' -> active_employee; performance_review 'negative_feedback' -> termination_initiated; active_employee 'request_to_leave' -> voluntary_exit; active_employee 'termination_decision' -> termination_initiated; termination_initiated 'finalize' -> terminated; voluntary_exit 'finalize' -> exited; failure 'retry' -> idle;

contract_prepared.description: Employment contract has been prepared and is ready to be sent

contract_sent.description: Employment contract has been sent to the candidate

contract_signed.description: Employment contract has been signed by the candidate

contracts.name: Signed Employment Contract
contracts.content: Signed version of the employment contract

docusign_send.name: Send via DocuSign
docusign_send.description: Send contract through DocuSign for signature

template.message: Please review and sign your employment contract

docusign_click_send.name: Send via DocuSign Click
docusign_click_send.description: Send policy through DocuSign Click for acceptance

template.subject: Interview Request Received for {{company.department}}
template.body:
Dear {{candidate.name}},

We received your interview request for the position in {{company.department}}.

Best regards,
HR Team

template.subject: Interview Reminder
template.body:
Dear {{candidate.name}},

This is a reminder about your upcoming interview...

template.title: interview requested by {{candidate.name}}
template.content: Candidate has requested an interview for {{company.department}} position

procedureTemplates.name: Freelance Software Development Service Contract
procedureTemplates.description: Workflow for a freelance software development contract from initial contact to final payment

template.title: Initial Contact Made
template.content: A potential client has made the initial contact.

template.title: Terms Accepted
template.content: The client has accepted the terms.

template.title: Contract Signed
template.content: The contract has been signed by the client.

template.title: Payment Initiated
template.content: The client has initiated the first payment.

template.title: Weekly Update
template.content: A weekly update on the project progress.

template.title: Project Completed
template.content: The project has been completed.

template.title: Final Approval
template.content: The project has received final approval.

template.title: Payment Confirmed
template.content: The final payment has been confirmed.

stateMachine.fsl: idle 'initial contact' -> project_offered; project_offered 'accept terms' -> terms_accepted; terms_accepted 'contract signed' -> contract_signed; contract_signed 'payment initiated' -> first_payment_processed; first_payment_processed 'weekly update' -> project_in_progress; project_in_progress 'project completed' -> project_completed; project_completed 'final approval' -> final_payment_initiated; final_payment_initiated 'payment confirmed' -> completed;

procedureTemplates.name: Carbon Credit Tokenization - Hydro Power
procedureTemplates.description: Complete workflow for converting hydro power measurements into verified carbon credit certificates using IoT devices

template.title: New hydro measurement from {{device.deviceType}}
template.content: Received {{captures.measurementValue}} {{event.data.unit}} from device {{device.deviceId}} at {{device.location}}

template.title: Batch accumulation progress
template.content: Collected measurement {{event.data.value}} for batch processing. Batch size: {{config.batchSize}}

template.title: Measurement batch ready for token creation
template.content: Collected {{config.batchSize}} measurements, ready to create carbon tokens

template.title: High-quality carbon token created
template.content: Created token {{event.data.tokenId}} with {{event.data.credits}} credits (quality: {{event.data.qualityScore}}%)

template.title: Certificate {{event.data.certificateId}} ready
template.content: Generated certificate with {{event.data.totalCredits}} carbon credits for project {{project.projectName}}

stateMachine.fsl: /* IoT Validator Component */ idle 'measurement_received' -> validating; validating 'signature_valid' -> measurement_validated; validating 'signature_invalid' -> validation_error; validation_error 'retry' -> idle; /* Measurement Queue Component */ measurement_validated 'batch_progress' -> accumulating_measurements; accumulating_measurements 'measurement_received' -> accumulating_measurements; accumulating_measurements 'batch_ready' -> batch_processed; /* Token Creator Component */ batch_processed 'token_creation_start' -> creating_tokens; creating_tokens 'tokens_created' -> tokens_ready; /* Quality Splitter Component */ tokens_ready 'quality_check' -> quality_evaluation; quality_evaluation 'high_quality' -> quality_approved; quality_evaluation 'low_quality' -> quality_review; quality_review 'manual_approval' -> quality_approved; quality_review 'rejected' -> idle; /* Token Accumulator Component */ quality_approved 'token_accumulate' -> accumulating_tokens; accumulating_tokens 'more_tokens' -> accumulating_tokens; accumulating_tokens 'threshold_reached' -> tokens_accumulated; /* Certificate Generator Component */ tokens_accumulated 'generate_certificate' -> generating_certificate; generating_certificate 'certificate_created' -> certificate_generated;

iot_validator.purpose: Validates IoT measurements with cryptographic signatures

measurement_queue.purpose: Accumulates measurements until batch threshold is reached

token_creator.purpose: Converts measurement batches into carbon tokens

quality_splitter.purpose: Routes tokens based on quality threshold

certificate_generator.purpose: Generates carbon credit certificates from token pools

validating.description: Validating IoT measurement signature and data integrity

processing_measurement.description: Processing validated measurement for batch accumulation

accumulating_measurements.description: Accumulating measurements until batch size is reached

creating_tokens.description: Converting measurement batch into carbon tokens

accumulating_tokens.description: Accumulating tokens until certificate threshold is reached

generating_certificate.description: Generating carbon credit certificate from accumulated tokens

certificate_generated.description: Carbon credit certificate has been successfully generated

quality_review.description: Manual review required for low-quality tokens

workflow_error.description: Error in the workflow that requires attention

validate_signature.name: Validate IoT Signature
validate_signature.description: Validate cryptographic signature from IoT device

mint_tokens.name: Mint Carbon Tokens
mint_tokens.description: Create carbon tokens from verified measurements

create_certificate.name: Create Certificate
create_certificate.description: Generate carbon credit certificate from token pool

procedureTemplates.name: Carbon Credit Tokenization - Solar Power
procedureTemplates.description: Complete workflow for converting solar power measurements into verified carbon credit certificates using IoT devices with higher frequency data collection

template.title: New solar measurement from {{device.deviceType}}
template.content: Received {{event.data.value}} {{event.data.unit}} with {{event.data.irradiance}}W/m irradiance

template.title: Solar measurement batch ready
template.content: Collected {{config.batchSize}} measurements over {{calculatedDuration}} for tokenization

stateMachine.fsl: /* Solar IoT Validator Component */ idle 'measurement_received' -> validating; validating 'signature_valid' -> irradiance_check; irradiance_check 'sufficient_light' -> measurement_validated; irradiance_check 'insufficient_light' -> measurement_discarded; measurement_discarded 'retry' -> idle; validating 'signature_invalid' -> validation_error; validation_error 'retry' -> idle; /* Solar Measurement Queue Component */ measurement_validated 'batch_progress' -> accumulating_measurements; accumulating_measurements 'measurement_received' -> accumulating_measurements; accumulating_measurements 'batch_ready' -> weather_adjustment; weather_adjustment 'adjustment_applied' -> batch_processed; /* Solar Token Creator Component */ batch_processed 'token_creation_start' -> creating_tokens; creating_tokens 'weather_factor_applied' -> tokens_ready; /* Quality Splitter Component */ tokens_ready 'quality_check' -> quality_evaluation; quality_evaluation 'high_quality' -> quality_approved; quality_evaluation 'low_quality' -> weather_review; weather_review 'weather_approved' -> quality_approved; weather_review 'weather_rejected' -> idle; /* Token Accumulator Component */ quality_approved 'token_accumulate' -> accumulating_tokens; accumulating_tokens 'more_tokens' -> accumulating_tokens; accumulating_tokens 'threshold_reached' -> tokens_accumulated; /* Certificate Generator Component */ tokens_accumulated 'generate_certificate' -> generating_certificate; generating_certificate 'certificate_created' -> certificate_generated;

solar_iot_validator.purpose: Validates solar IoT measurements with signature and irradiance checks

solar_measurement_queue.purpose: Accumulates solar measurements with weather adjustment factors

solar_token_creator.purpose: Creates solar carbon tokens with weather compensation

solar_quality_splitter.purpose: Routes solar tokens based on quality and weather factors

validating.description: Validating solar IoT measurement signature and data integrity

irradiance_check.description: Checking solar irradiance levels for measurement quality

weather_adjustment.description: Applying weather compensation factors to measurements

creating_tokens.description: Converting solar measurement batch into carbon tokens with weather adjustment

validate_signature.name: Validate Solar IoT Signature
validate_signature.description: Validate cryptographic signature from solar IoT device

check_irradiance_threshold.name: Check Solar Irradiance
check_irradiance_threshold.description: Verify minimum solar irradiance for valid measurement

mint_solar_tokens.name: Mint Solar Carbon Tokens
mint_solar_tokens.description: Create solar carbon tokens with weather compensation

certificates.name: Solar Carbon Credit Certificate
certificates.content: Verified Solar Carbon Credit Certificate for {{project.projectName}} - Gold Standard Compliant
